# status

**Instance Property**

The current status of the URL filter.

## Declaration

```swift
var status: NEURLFilterManager.Status { get async }
```

## Working with filter status

- **handleStatusChange()**: Sets up an observer for the status notification and models it as an asynchronous sequence.
- **NEURLFilterManager.Status**: An enumeration of URL filter status codes.
